flawed_nl_solution:
His brother has 15 rubber bands - 6 rubber bands = <<15-6=12>>12 rubber bands.
They have 15 rubber bands + 12 rubber bands = <<15+12=27>>27 rubber bands together.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
